channel.title: My first Subject , and REQ to Clients Impire!
channel.description:
Hi all
this is my first subject in moparscape
But im a member from long time maybe :)
wanna help from u
cuz no one in Rune-server helped me !
plz ... can any one help me ?
~~~~~~~~~~ The problem ~~~~~~~~~~~
I dl ( download ) palidino76 (317 server) , its called " Battlescape "
and when i run it ,,
i cant connect to it except with " Battlescape Client "
I hate that client cuz i cant make webclient from it ( because its hard in my opinion )
So ,, I made 317 webclient from Delta client , and i want to play from it !
But the server Didnt allow me to connect !
So can any one help ?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Finish ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Btw .. when i connect from delta client ,,
The server write " Wrong byte255 " ... !!
wats the problem ?
and who can help me ?
if u can ,,
i will give him something ,,, realy GOOD ..
Thank you moparscape ,,
and thanks to all Server's and client's Makers and coders ..
Need help ...
~~~~~~ BTW : im not good at english ,, so after helping me , try to rate my English " lol " ~~~~

item.title: My first Subject , and REQ to Clients Impire!
item.dc:creator: @madloom madloom
item.description:
@madloom wrote:

Hi all

this is my first subject in moparscape

But im a member from long time maybe

wanna help from u

cuz no one in Rune-server helped me !

plz … can any one help me ?

~~~~~~~~~~ The problem ~~~~~~~~~~~

I dl ( download ) palidino76 (317 server) , its called " Battlescape "

and when i run it ,

i cant connect to it except with " Battlescape Client "

I hate that client cuz i cant make webclient from it ( because its hard in my opinion )

So , I made 317 webclient from Delta client , and i want to play from it !

But the server Didnt allow me to connect !

So can any one help ?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Finish ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Btw … when i connect from delta client ,

The server write " Wrong byte255 " … !!

wats the problem ?

and who can help me ?

if u can ,

i will give him something , realy GOOD …

Thank you moparscape ,

and thanks to all Server’s and client’s Makers and coders …

Need help …

~~~~~~ BTW : im not good at english , so after helping me , try to rate my English " lol " ~~~~

Read full topic
